Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Atari 2600 fantasy console engine + editors

Complete LOVE 11.5 project \(34 Lua files, zero dependencies\):
- CRT shader pipeline \(scanlines, vignette, mask, curvature, noise\)
- 4:3 strict aspect ratio with nearest-neighbor scaling
- 32-color Atari-ish palette, 3x5 procedural pixel font
- ECS with integer entity IDs, component pools, query iterator
- Procedural audio: synth \(square/tri/saw/sine/noise\), SFX presets, step sequencer
- Sprite/tile system from palette-indexed grids
- Editors: sprite, SFX, music, tile definition, level \(object placement + tilemap\)
- Level editor v1: place/select/drag/resize/delete objects, undo/redo, multi-level files
- Demo platformer with player, coins, enemies, triggers, checkpoint system
- Runtime level loading from save/levels/ with F6 hot-reload

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix CRT-aware mouse mapping for editor accuracy

Add inverse barrel distortion so mouse clicks hit correct internal
pixels even with CRT curvature enabled. Extract shared distortion
constant \(CURVE_K=0.15\) matching GLSL, implement iterative Newton
inverse in Lua, and update screenToInternal\(\) to apply it.

- Editor defaults to curvature OFF \(Shift+F2 to re-enable\)
- F7 toggles mouse debug crosshair overlay
- Add cartridge system TODO block for next phase

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
